name: crngmgp

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccmn), wcel(c0, crg))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ CRing, c1 ∈ CMnd, c0 ∈ Ring)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccmn))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ccrg), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, ccmn)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CRing → c1 ∈ CMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CRing ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ CMnd))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccmn))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ccrg), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, ccmn)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CRing → c1 ∈ CMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CRing ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ CMnd))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ccrg), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, ccmn)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CRing ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ CMnd))
⊣ c1 =(mulGrp ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccmn))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmgp, c0))

comment: A commutative ring's multiplication operation is commutative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)
